query.pigql: a = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; a = filter a by {{column(oppty_name_filter.selection, ["Name"]).asEquality("Name")}}; a = foreach a generate (case when 'IsClosed' == "False" then daysBetween(now(), toDate(CloseDate_Year + "-" + CloseDate_Month  + "-" + CloseDate_Day, "yyyy-MM-dd")) else 0 end) as 'sum_Days_Open';

opp = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; opp = filter opp by {{column(oppty_name_filter.selection, ["Name"]).asEquality("Name")}}; opp = group opp by all; opp = foreach opp generate max('DaysSinceLastActivity') as 'max_DaysSinceLastActivity';
